alert.note: Alert for Madison; Rankin (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 20 at 7:59PM CDT until June 25 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Pearl River Above Philadelphia affecting Neshoba County. Pearl River near Lena affecting Leake County. Pearl River Near Carthage affecting Leake County. Pearl River At Edinburg affecting Leake County. Pearl River Near Ratliff`s Ferry affecting Rankin and Madison Counties. Pearl River At Jackson affecting Rankin and Hinds Counties. For the Upper Pearl River...including Philadelphia, Edinburg, Carthage, Walnut Grove, Lena, Kosciusko, Ratliff`s Ferry, Ofahoma, Jackson...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY MORNING TO SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pearl River Near Ratliff`s Ferry. * WHEN...From Wednesday morning to Sunday evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:15 PM CDT Tuesday the stage was 302.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tomorrow morning to a crest of 304.5 feet Thursday evening. It will then fall below flood stage early Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 303.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Wed Thu Fri Pearl River Ratliff`s Ferr 303.0 302.1 Tue 7 pm CDT 303.6 304.5 304.1 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued Wednesday morning at 900 AM CDT.
